meanings.definition: With limbs spread out in a relaxed or awkward position.
meanings.sent1: The tired cat lay asprawl on the sunny windowsill.
meanings.sent2: The children played asprawl on the grassy field, enjoying the warm sun.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy puppy looked quite asprawl as it napped in the shade.
meanings.sent4: The fallen tree lay asprawl across the path, blocking our way.
meanings.sent5: The starfish was found asprawl on the sandy beach, its arms reaching in all directions.

meanings.definition: In a sprawling or spread-out manner.
meanings.sent1: The vines grew asprawl along the garden fence, reaching for the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The city lights twinkled asprawl in the distance, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The spilled paint spread asprawl on the floor, creating a colorful mess.

meanings.sent5: The fireworks burst asprawl in the night sky, painting it with vibrant colors.
